name: Nick Staab
what_you_do: Public speaker, sales & wealth coach, and founder of the Masters Of Influence Academy. Mentors businesses and individuals to achieve greater things using his personal success blueprint.
who_you_serve: Businesses and individuals looking to master the art of selling and generate income.
offering: Sales and wealth coaching, mentorship, live training events teaching 'Selling By Serving' strategies.
social_proof: Amazon published author, personal sales record of over £10,000,000, collective sales of over £100,000,000 with business clients.
signature_programs: Masters Of Influence Bootcamp, Masters Of Influence Academy, "Selling is Serving" (Amazon published book)
business_focus: Coaching and training individuals and businesses to master sales through the 'Selling By Serving' methodology.
service_provided: Sales coaching, wealth coaching, live training bootcamps, business mentorship, public speaking
